title: Very Good
text: Found this restaurant near our apartment. The service was very good and food was delicious and beautifully presented.

title: Delicious
text: We loved this restaurant. Food was perfect. Service was outstanding. Loved the ambiance. We did show up without a reservation which you need here but they were accommodating. Itâ€™s located in an interesting location halfway up some pretty steps off to the side.

title: Must see
text: It was totally amazing. Wear a hat and bring water. It can be crowded. The Dionysus Theatre entrance is less crowded.

title: Interesting
text: Very interesting with many good restaurants. Very narrow winding streets. One of the oldest parts of Barcelona.

title: Wonderful Experience
text: We loved our stay at Aparthotel Arai. The location is close to everything. The staff working the front desk was always very friendly and professional. The hotel is beautiful. I believe it had been an old palace refurbished. Our room was spacious and always very clean. We felt very comfortable like being in our own home when we returned from a long day of sightseeing. The bathroom was beautiful and the shower was the best I have ever used. Lots of water. The towels were huge and thick. Our ceilings were very high and loved the original refinished hardwood floors.

title: Love this hotel
text: Beautiful contemporary design in a very old historic building with lovely views from our room. Staff is very nice and complimentary breakfast fabulous. The location is amazing as seen in last photo. Located next to the Prague Bridge and very close to the Prague Castle.
